overview: Louis is chairman and CEO of Open Solutions and the author of Too Small to Fail: How the Financial Industry Crisis Changed the World’s Perceptions. Louis serves on the board of directors of HSBC North America Holdings Inc. He is also a current member of the board of directors of Avid Technology Inc. (NASDAQ: AVID), a publicly-traded company and worldwide leader in providing tools for film, video, audio, 3D animation, gaming and broadcast professionals. He also serves on the board of Unica Corporation (NASDAQ: UNCA), a publicly-traded company and leading global provider of enterprise marketing management software and services. As a recognized technology executive, Louis is the vice chair of the Governor’s Council on Economic Competitiveness and Technology appointed by the governor of Connecticut.
